content: that is cute and silly with its floppy legs slip_stitch=slip_stitch fo=fasten_off previous customers of mine enjoyed yo=yarn over magic_ring= magic_ring tying the frogs to objects or their inv decrease=invisible decrease clothes by their legs begin with mc and 4mm hook 1 magic_ring+chain 1 and single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 2 increase in each st around 3-4 single_crochet around sl st to 1st st *& fasten_off after 4th round see picture for the first bump only second eye bump now make another eye bump 5 repeat rounds 1-4 above but do not sl st or fasten_off at the end of this second eye bump instead continue 6 continuing from 2nd completed eye bump -chain 2 & single_crochet pm here to indicate our new beginning of the round into the 1st eye bump you made to attach them together see eye bump picture guide single_crochet 11 around that eye bump single_crochet 2 into one loop of the chain to get across to the other eye bump - then single_crochet 12 around the second eye bump single_crochet 2 into the chain spaces do not f o continue to the body instructions on next page eye bumps picture guide body picture guide pt 1 now that the foundation for the body has been established in the last part continue *note see body picture guide for guidance 7-18 single_crochet in each st around * now flip the froggy inside out -using the tail from one of the eye bumps go in with a needle & stitch the hole closed using the mattress st any holes near the eyes *if there are any see picture guide where i show my hole near the eye bumps -tie off the ends on the inside of the frog or weave in flip back right side out & continue 19 single_crochet 6 inv decrease repeat around until you run out of sts *may not end up a perfect repeat at the end that is ok 20 insert eyes between rounds 3&4 approx from top of eye bumps optional add embroidered cheek details under each eye with cc yarn *add in embroidered mouth detail in black yarn 21 single_crochet 4 inv decrease repeat ending with single_crochet 4 22 single_crochet 2 inv decrease repeat ending with single_crochet 3 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet *leave open and unstuffed for now *guide continues next page body picture guide pt 2 make 4 now we are going to make the limbs using mc 1 chain 12 then chain 3 more this is your fingers or toes slip_stitch in 1st chain of the chain 3 you just did for the fingers/toes and repeat for 3 fingers/toes total on each of the limbs ~*chain 3 and slip_stitch in the 1st chain ~*chain 3 and slip_stitch in the 1st chain then slip_stitch to the main chain chain of 12 then slip_stitch all the way down the back bumps of the chain fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing on to the frog s body later limbs picture guide *guide continues next
